name: Escape: VR
description:
The main objective in this game is to find your way out. Look for hints, notes or anything you could find in order to find the way out.

Current features:

* Atmosphere based game-play
* Story driven puzzles
* Different endings (depending on what path you choose)
* Random encounters

We would also love to heard a feedback from you. For that, please refer to our community forums! Oculus Rift support will be coming within next two months.
